DOC.brief_summary: Aim NIS retrospectively document management diabetic patient retinopathy naturalistic setting Switzerland . Following element go analyze : - medication use keep blood pressure control ? - medication use metabolic control ? - average control level metabolism blood pressure compliant international guideline ? - laser photocoagulation play role control metabolism blood pressure ? - difference control metabolism blood pressure patient DM I DM II ? - influence renal failure choose medication ?
DOC.brief_title: Management Diabetes Mellitus Patients With Retinopathy
